mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: Our mission is to provide innovative technology consulting and custom software solutions that strengthen our clients' competitive position in their sectors. We are committed to delivering excellence through collaboration, innovation, and a deep understanding of our clients' unique needs.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: We envision becoming a leading technology partner recognized for our expertise, innovation, and commitment to client success. We strive to be at the forefront of digital transformation, helping businesses achieve their goals through cutting-edge solutions and strategic guidance.

goal.title: Our Goals
goal.description: Our primary goals are to deliver exceptional value to our clients, foster long-term partnerships, continuously innovate our service offerings, and contribute to the advancement of technology in various industries. We aim to exceed expectations and drive measurable results.

team.title: Our Team
team.subtitle: Meet the talented individuals who make our success possible
team.description: Our diverse team of experts brings together years of experience in technology, consulting, and innovation to deliver exceptional results for our clients.

services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: Professional solutions for your digital transformation.
services.trainingDesc: Customized trainings given by industry-leading instructors. Special consultancy services for companies' needs and ISO Management Systems.
services.consultationRndProjectsDesc: Comprehensive consultation services, research and development projects, and strategic project management to help your business innovate and grow.
services.programmingSoftwareDesc: We carry out software and coding work that will bring your imagined business ideas to the digital world in line with your needs. Web, mobile, and desktop application development.
services.webMobileDesc: We carry out software and coding work that will bring your imagined business ideas to the digital world in line with your needs.
services.trainingsDesc: Customized trainings given by industry-leading instructors. Special consultancy services for companies' needs and ISO Management Systems.
services.corporateSolutionsDesc: We strive to be your strongest solution partner in your digital transformation journey. While offering corporate solutions, we consider both internal operations and stakeholder needs.
services.consultancyDesc: Presidency's Digital Transformation Office - Information and Communication Security Regulation Compliance Project. Artificial Intelligence Supported Risk Analysis and Management.
services.mindLabSubtitle: Professional psychological and therapeutic training programs
services.course1Title: Psychological Picture Tests Application and Picture Analysis Course
services.course1Desc: Projective picture test training for professionals working with children. Comprehensive training on psychological assessment techniques and interpretation methods.
services.course2Desc: Art therapy-based somatic regulation and trauma work. Learn evidence-based techniques for trauma processing and body-based healing approaches.
services.course3Desc: Horticultural therapy applications and terrarium workshop. Explore the therapeutic benefits of nature-based interventions and hands-on gardening techniques.
services.course3Instructor: Doç. Dr. Hacer GÖK UĞUR ve Ekibi
services.course4Desc: Mindfulness-based breathing techniques and stress management. Practical tools for integrating breathwork into therapeutic practice and daily life.
services.course4Instructor: Dr. Öğr. Üyesi Behice Belkıs Çalışkan & Dr. Öğr. Üyesi Ülkü Yılmaz
services.statsCoursesDesc: The honor of holding the course
services.statsSatisfactionDesc: Level of satisfaction with the course

horticulturalTherapy.title: HORTICULTURAL THERAPY APPLICATIONS COURSE
horticulturalTherapy.purpose: This training is prepared to raise awareness about horticultural therapy applications. It aims to show how horticultural therapy applications can be used as a supportive element in health and social care areas.
learningGoals: Participants will learn the philosophy and scientific foundations of horticultural therapy applications.
Participants will learn the physical, mental, and social effects of horticultural therapy applications based on evidence.
Participants will gain program development skills related to horticultural therapy applications.
horticulturalTherapy.targetAudience: Health professionals, social service and care workers, landscape architects, agricultural engineers, and undergraduate and graduate students interested in the subject.

items: Connecting with Nature, Nature-Based Interventions and Health Effects
Definition and History of Horticultural Therapy
Plant Production Techniques in Horticultural Therapy Applications
Program Creation Process in Horticultural Therapy

horticulturalTherapy.methods: Approaches to be used during training: Presentation, Group work, Application examples, Practical training.
horticulturalTherapy.materials: Trainer notes and terrarium design materials.
trainers: Doç. Dr. Hacer GÖK UĞUR, Public Health Nursing
Dr. Öğr. Üyesi Şeyma ŞENGÜR, Landscape Architecture
Prof. Dr. Adnan UĞUR, Garden Plants
Doç. Dr. Diler US ALTAY, Medical Biochemistry
Doç. Dr. Oya Sevcan ORAK, Psychiatric Nursing
Dr. Öğr. Üyesi Ayla HENDEKCİ, Public Health Nursing
Uzman Hemşire Mürselcan KABAKCI, Public Health Nursing

home.title: EMECE YAZILIM
home.subtitle: EDUCATION AND CONSULTANCY
home.description: Established in 2024 with the support of Istanbul Medeniyet University Technopark, we aim to produce technological knowledge, develop innovations, improve quality, efficiency, and cost elements, commercialize knowledge, and offer national and international cooperation projects and services by fostering University-Industry collaboration.

aboutUs.title: About Us
aboutUs.description1: We offer innovative technology consulting and custom software solutions designed to strengthen your competitive position in your sector.
aboutUs.description2: In the solutions and applications we offer, we evaluate your business model, brand vision, target audience or user characteristics, and your preferences together. We aim to help you reach the ideal application as a result of these multi-variable development processes.
aboutUs.ourApproachDesc: In all the services we provide, we take into account your brand values, brand goals, user characteristics, and special requests.
aboutUs.ourCommitmentDesc: We enable you to reach ideal and sustainable applications that will ensure success at every stage.
aboutUs.strategicDevelopmentDesc: For the best results, we evaluate feedback on software or applications developed in accordance with the business plan and help you plan new strategies for the future.

products.title: Our Products
products.subtitle: Innovative solutions to take your business into the future
products.riskCrewsDesc: AI-powered risk management platform that transforms expert assessments into measurable risk scores with fuzzy logic algorithms.
products.mediCrewsDesc: Smart healthcare management system that digitizes hospital operations by optimizing clinical workflows and resource management.
products.hotelCrewsDesc: Platform that automates staff and guest experience by optimizing hotel operations and service delivery.
products.emlakCrewsDesc: Platform developed specifically for the real estate sector, offering data-driven property management and analytics solutions.
products.drMemoriesDesc: System that automates medical documentation with natural language processing and creates clinical notes with artificial intelligence.
